string.text:
$key_interact - Place Object
 
 $key_collision - Toggle Collision Detection
 $key_align - Toggle Surface Alignment
 
 $key_mode - Switch to Advanced Mode
 ESCAPE - Cancel Placement

$key_interact - Place Object
 
 Transforms:
 MOUSE1 - Move on Horizontal Plane
 MOUSE2 - Rotate about Vertical Axis
 LSHIFT + MOUSE1 - Move along Vertical Axis
 
 Modifiers:
 LALT - Snap
 LCTRL - Finetune Control
 
 $key_mode - Switch to Preview Mode
 ESCAPE - Switch to Normal Mode

$key_interact - Place Object
 
 ESCAPE - Cancel Placement
 $key_mode - Switch to Advanced Mode
